item.title: Generative AI II(I): Rise of the Agents
item.description:
2025 is all about Agentic AI. Organizations rushing to the digital riverbed for ‘artificial’ gold, only to find themselves observing others trying to yield the same value without the right knowledge and tools.

While the (applied) technology has a lot of potential, generating business value out of it is still at very early stages. There are a lot of products who bring DIY Agentic AI capabilities, yet embedding it in an organization and yielding value is where organizations struggle. People simply don’t know how to deal with and oversee ‘it’. Is it a threat? Do I lose control? Will it have a heartbeat? Will it do my dishes?
